item.title: Word2vec-style vector arithmetic on docs embeddings
item.description:

item.title: Czech police forced to turn off facial recognition cameras at the Prague airport
item.description:
However, the Czech police continue to systematically violate the law in further processing of biometric data. By Iuridicum Remedium (IuRe) (guest author) · October 29, 2025 Airport facial recognition system long criticised The Czech Republic Police used a camera system with facial recognition capabilities at Václav Havel Airport in Prague from 2018, until it was shut down in August 2025. The police systematically violate laws when processing biometric data The Czech police are also ignoring the law in the case of another biometric tool – Digital Personal Image Information System.

Read more
